sidenav_page.add: Button with options to create a folder or feature.
sidenav_page.home: We have on this section the co.meta tutorial, help and documentation.
sidenav_page.data_driven_sidenav: Execution of tests based on the variables provided by the excel sheet
sidenav_page.variables_sidenav: In this section, we can add or edit variables among other functionalities
sidenav_page.recent: The last tests you have run

data_driven.data_driven_button: Execution of tests based on the variables provided by the excel sheet

need_help.can_help: Enabling this option allows you to assist on features marked with "Ask for help"
need_help.tooltip: This feature is asking for help
need_help.explanation: Enabling this option allows other users to help you on this feature

websockets.Timeout: Timed out searching for container with browser context.

user.tour_description: In co.meta you can learn about features interactive using the virtual tour guide. The virtual tour guide will show you around and explain step by step the how's and where's. Move your mouse over the tour buttons to see a short description.
user.webhooks_desc: Integrating co.meta with your preferred tools empowers you to optimize your development process. By seamlessly connecting Co.Meta, you can accelerate project completion, implement continuous testing practices, and effectively share quality updates with your entire department.

continue_on_failure.tooltip: This checkbox is disabled because Continue on failure is already enabled on a top item.

save: Marks the current item as saved.
unsave: Unmarks the current item as saved.

tooltips.delete_templates_with_features: If checked, the template images of each result will also be deleted
tooltips.variables_requires: Please select a department and environment to edit variables
tooltips.latest_browser: The latest stable version of this browser will be used automatically
tooltips.invalid_edit_form: We found errors in the form, please fix them before saving
tooltips.step_timeout_ignored: Timeout is ignored for this step.
tooltips.step_timeout: Set maximum timeout after which this step will be forced to stop.

you_sure.delete_item_title: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
you_sure.quit_title: Are you sure you want to quit?
you_sure.remove_all: Are you sure you want to remove all the steps?
you_sure.decrypt_title: Are you sure you want to decrypt this variable?
you_sure.decrypt_desc: Decrypting a variable will reset the environment variable value.
you_sure.budget_exceeded_desc: The feature you are about to run will exceed your configured budget. Do you want to continue?
you_sure.budget_ahead_desc: The feature you are about to run will likely exceed your configured budget. Do you want to continue?
you_sure.move_feature: You are attempting to move feature to different department, environment variables that the feature in question is currently using, will no longer be usable. Do you want to continue?
